text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria macrocarpa is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Kerala and Tamil Nadu in India.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Psychotria macrocarpa". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38839A10152626. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38839A10152626.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
